外部錢包地址需要支付手續費，手續費會動態變更。: The external wallet address needs to pay a handling fee, and the handling fee will be dynamically changed.
虛擬貨幣交易一經發送就無法取消或更改，請特別留意。若提供的地址錯誤，恕本公司無法: It cannot be cancelled or changed once the virtual currency transaction is sent. Please note that if the address provided is wrong, our company shall not be held responsible for any loss arising.
僅支援 ERC-20 版本的 USDT貨幣。: Only ERC-20 version of USDT currency is supported.
收幣地址錯誤: The recipient address is wrong, please confirm.
請輸入打幣數量: Please enter the number of coins, thank you!
提幣數量不可輸入負數!!: You cannot enter a negative number for the withdrawal amount, please re-enter, thank you!
InvaildWalletPassword: The wallet password is incorrect, please check.
已傳送至區塊鏈網路中, 請等待區塊鏈交易完成: Has been sent to the blockchain network, please wait for the blockchain transaction to complete.
網路異常, 請重新操作: The network is abnormal, please check!
地址錯誤: The address is wrong, please check.
請輸入欲轉換之數量: Please enter the quantity to be converted.
試算結果及匯率僅提供參考，實際匯率仍以交易當時匯率為準。: The trial calculation results and exchange rate are for reference only, and the actual exchange rate is still subject to the exchange rate at the time of the transaction.
